import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Process insight data and stream incremental plain text output"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/ext/mcp/{toolbox_id}/it"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Accepts a JSON payload and returns a streamed plain text response where each line represents incremental processing output.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"toolbox_id","in":"path","description":"Identifier of the MCP toolbox","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"JSON payload to process","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Streaming text response; each line is an incremental processing result","content":{"text/plain":{"schema":{"type":"string","description":"Newline-delimited streaming text"}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request","content":{"text/plain":{}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized","content":{"text/plain":{}}},"500":{"description":"Internal server error","content":{"text/plain":{}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
